text:
Yo Abhijeet!
You're one of the most humble persons I have ever met and the best roomie I could/would ever get. Bro apni toh itni memories hai and future me bhi hongi, yaha likhna toh formality hogi but ok.

Starting from the day-1, I was worried ki mera roomie kaisa hoga but after I met you, tabhi pta chal gya tha ki I have got such a calm and nice roomie. Mere parents bhi first day hi samjh gye the ki I have got such a nice roomie. Also hum dono hi kitna shy the xD. Uske baad to kitna maja kia h wing me. First year me toh apni classes ka time alag tha and baaki time tu mostly Athletics me rehta tha.. so I got some time alone (ykwim üòõ). You never complained about anything and roomies hone k baad bhi humne kabhi kisi chhoti si baat pe bhi ladai nhi ki ‚ù§Ô∏è. 

Second year me bhi no doubt firse roomies. Tera (Apna) breakfast almost hamesha hi miss hota tha xD. When you (and Abhinav) got to know something, and kaafi discussions huye xD. Kaafi stories share ki h and kaafi kuch seekha tujhse. Apni sath me jada trips to nhi huyi but apne Dharmshala wali trip ab tak ki best thi. Unplanned trip, unplanned trek.. sab kuch me bhot maja aya. Kaise apan ne Tarish ko Trek k liye push kia, raatko vo camping.. everything was fun.

Canteen/Shop C/Mama Mio/Oat/Z square kahi bhi jana ho toh mostly sath me hi gye h and it was always fun. Tu kaafi chaapu hai and I am sure tu kaafi acha krega life me. Jaldi se apni lab set up krle üòõ and fir PhD and fir New Zealand me bhi settle hona h üòõ. Campus me jo last 30 days beetaye, was the best thing that happened to me after 2020, thanks to you and other wingies. Yaar campus k day-1 se Kanpur me last day tak sath me the.. even when I was leaving Kanpur, bus stand pe bhi ham sath me the ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è. I am sure hamara ye bond poori life rahega and milte rahenge ofc. I feel myself really lucky that I met you.

All the best for your future!
Love you bro ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

P.S.: Ek baat ka hamesha dukh rahega life me jo campus me nhi kr paye..... Mio Cornetto nhi kha paye despite our innumerable tries ;-;
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Abhinav! One of my closest friends in IITK. Bulla kaatne k liye humesha taiyaar rheta h tu and charasi toh tu h hi shakal se. Tujhse interact krne me maja ata tha and second year me jo tu har 2 min baad kisi or k room me milta tha xD..  Yaar itna sa pet leke tu BBQ me itna kaise kha leta tha?
and har ladki ki kundli xD. Sirf baal dekhke tu lakdi ki kundli bta skta h!! Sadly tere sath koi trip nhi ho payi :( but dw at least ek trip toh jarur krenge. Hope ki tu last 30 days campus me aata but okay.
P.S.: Jaldi se IES ban ja fir toh life set.. and bandiya hi bandiya hongi...
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Bhatia!
I know tune memoirs public toh krne h nhi but still likh hi deta hu xD. Sabse pehle mai tujhe TA201 me mila. Bro kaafi maza aya tha vo tatti sa project krne me.. vo blades wala (kya naam tha bc).. Yaar vo pura na ho pata agar tu usko ghar se complete na krwake lata xDD.
Uske baad thoda bhot hi/hello ho jata tha.. then hamare ML k exams me ek sath seat thi :P.. Hum dono ek dusre k bharose aate the exam dene xD. Fir same internship.. kaafi maja aya usme bhi. tbh starting me toh mai thoda disappoited tha kyunki mujhe laga tha ki hum same team me honge toh dono hi fraud maarenge lmao but aisa nhi hua xD. Kaafi ache se nikl gyi internship.
Bro tujhse interact baat krna hamesha acha lagta h and BT share krna toh is always fun. Ab toh ja bhi same hi jagah rhe h (hopefully :P). Agar WFH nhi hota toh kaafi maje krte Noida me but chill hai.. Milte rahenge bro <3
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Hello GoD Pandey ji _/\_
Yaar itne chaapu kaise ho.. I have always admired you like jo bhi kuch krte ho hamesha chaap hi lete ho usme.. Jitna bhi interaction hua hamara (related to courses or otherwise), it was always good. Bolne ki jarurat nhi but aise hi chaapte rehna future me bhi and yeah contact me rehna. Hopefully milenge future me.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Moond! You were the only one in the wing jisko mai pehle se janta tha but tera impression "Barmer wale ka dost" tha. Anyway I have always felt good with you. Tera peer pressure me aake kuch bhi bolna, teri logical baate, those trips (vo rafting me doobna).. sab kuch yaad rahega :'). Hum log toh hopefully milte rahenge and abhi kaafi saari trips bhi to krni h ;).
Vaise ye last 30 days kaafi memorable rahe. Ok aise hi hamesha smile krte rehna.

P.S.: Ye crypto me paise sirf doobenge hi :(
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text: Hello Doctor Engineer Machine Learner Misogynist HEC destroyer Das Aniket.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo R*ndi! I remember that "soft vs hard" debate jo orientation k time hua tha and you summarised "The Alchemist" xD. You have mostly been busy in Antaragni and stuff, so utna jada maze nhi kr paye jitna maine baaki wingies k sath kia but jitna bhi time spend kia, it was always fun (not saying ki humne kam time spend kia.. kaafi time spend kia xD). Tere sath masti krne me maza ata tha (and calling you 'chuuutiyaaaa') :P
and yes hum log pakka trip pe chalenge ye covid situation thoda improve hone pe. Aise hi humesha haste rehna.
P.S.: I hope tujhe Pulkit wala deo mil jaye :P
P.P.S: Idk how to write in bold but whoever is reading this memoir.. MAI EK BAAR JAI KO GHAR CHHODNE GYA THA (CAMPUS TO HIS CITY) xD.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text: Yo Kaityar! I am glad to be your wingie. Those night cricket, mafia nights, wing hangouts.. sab kuch yaad rahega :). And yeah you are a chaapu actor.. I hope you will continue this even after college ;). Aise hi hamesha smile krte rehna...
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Atul!
Yaar Phy lab me toh hum dono ne milke kya fraud maara h xDD. Uske baad toh mostly common courses k kaaran hi interaction hua h and it was always fun. Hopefully milte h future me.. all the best till then!
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text: Yo bro.. I am happy that I could meet you. It was nice meeting you. Most classes me you asked some really good doubts, and yeah hopefully we would cross our paths in future. All the best!
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Ayush!
Apna interaction mostly class/canteen or mess me hi hua and it was always fun. Not to mention tu kaafi chaapu hai. Last k 30 days me vo CCD, MamaMio, Oat, Urban Crave k hangouts me kaafi maja aya. Hope ki hum future me milenge.. all the best till then!
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Durgesh!
I remember Orientation time pe we were in the same group most of the times.. and tabhi tujhse interact krke pta chal gya tha ki tu kaafi chaapu hai. And uske baad PE me bhi same batch me the, CHM lab me bhi ham table neighbours the xD and tab bhi interaction was fun. Second year k baad thoda limited interaction hua (until the last 30 days spent in campus <3) but ok.. Last 30 days jitna bhi hangout kia (Oat/Chocolate  room/Urban Crave), it was fun. Being itna chaapu, you were still down to Earth and one of the most humble guys. Needless to say but aise hi chaapte rehne in future. Hopefully milenge in future.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Harsh! You were my very first 'CSE' friend. Kuch coursework wagarh discuss krna ho toh you have always been the first contact. Hard-working toh tu h hi.. tujhe dekhke mujhe kabhi kabhi motivation milta tha magne ka. And you are really a good guy! Agar tu na hota wing me toh I can't imagine mera kya hota department me. Hope ki hum log aur trips kare sath me and yeah Korea aayenge hum log milne ;).
P.S.: If anyone is going through this memoir, then do follow "Manufacturer Harsh Agarwal" on fb :P
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Deepak!
Kaafi memories h hamari and I am very lazy to write (for the second time now ;-;) but still here we go.

First year me toh I knew you as "Harsh, Abhinav ka coaching batchmate". I don't remember when we talked for the first time but it was regarding grades I guess.

I got to know you more from second year. I still remember CS201 k endsem me tu 1 ghanta late aaya tha exam dene xD fir bhi chaap dia. I guess hamara interaction mostly spam grp k baad hua tha.. and classes me ho jata tha irl. Fir you, me and Sayak decided to work under Pramod sir.. and summers me unka kaam (fraud?) kia üòõ. Bro tu kuch bhi achieve kr skta h you just need motivation.. jaise maine and Sayak ne tujhse PVF k naam pe sab code krwa lia tha xD.

Third year me toh fir we took that project as UGP. I still regret hame vo 9 credits ka ugp lena chahiye tha but ok. And yeah ICPC dia sath me (noovs us). Uss sem toh hamne kaafi gariyaya certain profs ko (ykwim üòõ). Anyway ro-dho k nikal gya vo sem. And yeah internship drive me jo BT hui thi, agar savior Adobe na aati toh hamara kya hota!! But it ended well. Fir toh sixth sem k baad toh teri dasse ki streak start ho gyi xD (bade log).

Last k 30 days on campus were really fun. Thanks for the wing photoshoot and oximeter whenever required. And yeah ab toh same hi jagah job h (hopefully) toh onsite hone k baad parties toh krte rahenge obv (mai daaru nhi peeyunga though ;-;). Chal all the best for your future. I know tu chaapta rahega. Love you bro ‚ù§Ô∏è

P.S.: Don't worry bro, apne Adobe me chaapenge (unless you cheat on me by joining some other company) and if need arises, we can always switch.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Pence! One of the nicest guys I have met in college. Coaching me I had seen you when MSC sir introduced you as "shooter", tab I found your name weird xD. You have always been a humble and helpful guy. kisi ko kuch bhi help chahiye ho, you have always been ready. and man you are really hard-working.. I am sure agar itna dedication continue rakhe toh you'd definitely achieve great heights. And I still remember that chappal wala incident xD.
Aise hi haste rehna.. Hope ki hum log milte rahenge and yeah jald hi trip krte h ;)
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Shahid!
Kaafi maje kiye h first year me. First year me Mini Militia me kaafi maje aate the and you were a tough competition. Uske baad pubg me bhi kaafi maje kiye. Uske alawa Takneek/wing hangouts/mafia/Fests ftw. Second year k baad toh alag wing ho gyi thi toh interaction thoda kam ho gya. Ye last 30 days me kaafi maje kiye campus me, frisbee me kaafi maja aya. Last me hum 3-4 log hi bach gye the. Last to last day jab light chali gyi thi and toofan aya tha, uske baad humne "Fight club" dekhi. Hopefully future me milenge and I believe tu aise hi chaapte rahega.. All the best till then!
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Varshney!
Irl toh jada interaction nhi hua but ok.. mostly COM ki classes me hi hua. FB pe hua h kaafi like tagging and all that spamming. I have always seen you as a studious as well as a chill guy. Hope ki future me interaction hota rahega and milenge. All the best till then!
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Hello Big Chungus!
Kaafi limited interaction hua hamara irl.. mostly in canteen ya tumhare wing aata tha. Kaafi chill banda h tu and terko khush hi dekha h mostly. Ab tu aake apna monologue start kre usse pehle mai bhaag jata hu. All the best for you future! Apni shaadi me jarur bula lena.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Hello irony k chode Rajat Chaudhary. I don't know who you are but still I will write a memoir because you wrote one for me and if I don't write it would look rude. Just kidding xD.
Anyway kaafi limited interaction hua hamara mostly in canteens ya jab mai Sayak k room pe ata tha and jo hua usme bhi mostly tu photos kheechke grp me daal deta tha but okay, it was fun afterall. And yeah teri grammar correct krne me maja ata h xD ( it is video and not vedio :P). I hope tu thoda kam ironic ho and thoda kam RR kre. All the best for your future! Let's meet (at your funeral xD) soon.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Ram!
I remember you from Vibrant. Jab Mains ka result laga tha udhar tab I got to know there is this chaapu Ram guy. Unfortunately campus me utna interaction hua nhi but ok, I hope hum future me milenge and yeah aise hi chaapte rehna.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Ramu!
Kaafi memories h but since aaj deadline h.. toh jaldi jaldi likhke apni attendance de deta hu. Yaar ek toh tu kaafi jor (high volume) se bolta h. Pingala se related koi query ho toh you are the go-to person xD. Wing hangouts toh kaafi kiye hi h but I guess hamne kaafi time ye last k 30 days me spend kia h sath me. MamaMio, Domino's, IPL, Oat what not.. Chal all the best for your future and yeah milte rahenge.
P.S.: I hope Ashok and Tulsi thik h xD
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
What do you call a nude rat in a shoe? Yes tere jokes isse bhi jada lame hote hai. Anyway I have been lucky to meet you. You are really very creative and those memes on VBK have really made me laugh xD. "Aisa kyu", "Ni khana maine" all those quotes I'd remember always.. and pubg khelne me jo maja ata tha my fellow AOB mate, those mafia nights :), gym ka subscription leke na jana, those tatti jokes .. and the Sikkim trip .. that river rafting adventure.. xD. Can't write everything here. Contact me to hum rahenge hi and hopefully trip bhi krenge soon. and aise hi hard working rehna and bakchod robots banana iykwim.
P.S.: apni intern k baare me kisiko mat batana ü§´ 
P.P.S.: You still have one year to install an AC in RR-CC.. ab toh kr hi lena ploxx
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Rishab!
Sabse pehle Mudreka k through mila tujhe but yeah uske baad acchi friendship ho gyi.. Kaafi CSE courses share kiye humne and assignments too xD (first one was crypto right?) Mostly academics tak hi hamara interaction limited rha but ok.. Hum to same hi field me h toh hopefully milte rahenge..
tab tak k liye all the best for your future...
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text: In case the deadline doesn't get extended and I am unable to write a memoir, consider this as my presence.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo coder Moiz!
Kaafi memories h yaar apni! but still for formality idhar bhi likh deta hu. First year me toh tere sone k kisse mashur the.. koi nhi utha pata tha tujhe (except Tarish sometimes :P). I am glad that hum bhai bane. Kaafi chill banda h tu and starting me toh kitna noob tha pubg me. Fir pta nhi itna pro kaise ban gya. Abhi bhi yaad h ki jab apan team up krke 8 log khel rhe the tab tu aise nanga leta hua tha map me ki dusri team wale bole ki ye bot h mat maaro üòÇ. Kaafi bakchodia ki h wing me sath me. Sikkim trip was also fun.. Udhar lake me jaake jo tera photoshoot kia maine üò§ and tune meri haggi photos kheechi üò§.  Arre teri placement ki tension rehti thi and last me tune chaap dia yaar!! Ab toh life set h and shaadi bhi ho hi jayegi xD. Hopefully trip krte h jaldi sath me and yeah fir teri shaadi me to wing reunion hoga hi.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Shobhit!
Sabse pehle toh terko fb spamming se hi jana tha.. uske baad jab tune pubg tournament organise krwaya tha tab mile irl Ig. Pubg kehlne me kaafi maja ata tha and Valo now sometimes.. And lockdown k time Among Us me bhi kaafi maja aya.. and discord k chutiyapo me bhi xD. Ab BGMI aane de fir khelenge noov.
Hopefully life me fir milenge...
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Soumya!
Apan internship me mile but I wish ham pehle mile hote.. Yaar tere bina internship poori na ho pati.. Tu kaafi hard working hai and always ready to work. Yaar I wished ki hum teeno at least ek baar successful internship ki party krte campus me (or Bangalore) but ho nhi paya. No worries same hi jagah job hai toh we can always party :P.
All the best for your future endeavors! Aise hi chaapte rehna.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Tarish! Glad that we have been 'bhais'. You are one of the most knowledgeable guys I've ever met. If we start from the very beginning, I remember you got that T-shirt during orientation and then teri GPL li thi xD. That was the time when most of us got acquainted with the concept of GPL xD. Be it anime, tech, food, movies, any random stuff.. you had knowledge about every f thing. Those trips, I could never forget. Man tujhe trekking krwayi thi!! can't even imagine. Those gyaan chodna sessions by you, when you used to die in pubg and then (mis)guide us, random youtube videos... can't write lombe paras unlike you :\
Anyway hope ki hum log jaldi milenge.. Man I believe you can reach great heights, you just have to move your lazy ass..
P.S.: Aunty cooks really well.. and I hope I get another chance(s) to visit your home...
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo Umang!
Yaar you are one of the most chaapu and chill guy of CSE. I have hardly found any chaapu guy who played games(?) as well. Pubg me tu kaafi time online dikhta tha xD, still you managed to ace academics. Kuch utna jada interaction nhi ho paya, but jitna bhi hua it was always fun. Not to mention Valo too. Abhi BGMI aane wala h.. khelte h firse (our squad vs yours xD). And yeah ye last sem wala IME course lena was a huge mistake but still prof ko itna galiyana is itself a memory. Needless to say but aise hi chaapte rehna future me bhi.
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana

text:
Yo AOB-MMC!
I guess sabse pehle ham tab mile the jab tu Tarish k room pe aya tha.. fir thoda interaction hone laga and fir hum pubg khelne lage.. kaafi maja ata tha yaar pubg khelne me and that tournament we played together ‚ù§Ô∏è..
Not to mention chaapu toh tu hai hi.. jo bhi cheez krta hamesha chaap deta h. Last years me toh hamara most interaction apne grp me hi hua h but ok. I wish hamare grp ki jaldi koi trip ho and maje krenge. Needless to say but aise hi chaapte rehna.

P.S.: I hope ham firse BGMI khelenge.. or you can try Valorant xD
author: Bholeshwar  Khurana
